headline: Merck Gets EC Nod for 21-Valent Pneumococcal Jab Capvaxive
summary: The European Commission approves MRK's pneumococcal 21-valent conjugate vaccine, Capvaxive, for pneumococcal vaccination in adults.

headline: GSK accuses Pfizer of delaying Covid vaccine result until after US election
summary: Donald Trump’s justice department is investigating claims that Pfizer delayed positive news about its Covid-19 vaccine until after the 2020 election.

headline: Why Pfizer Is My Largest Healthcare Position
summary: Healthcare stocks have been out of vogue with investors since late 2022.  Myriad reasons underlie the negative sentiment toward the healthcare sector, but in some instances, this dour take isn't entirely warranted.  Pharmaceutical titan Pfizer (NYSE: PFE) is a case in point.
